__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Building Materials

pages.text: Intro to different building blocks during the early game
$(thing)Wattle$() is a very versatile building material, which can be improved with $(thing)daub$().
To weave sticks into Wattle and make it solid, right-click on it with 4 $(thing)sticks$(). Optionally, add $(thing)daub$() to it in the same way.

Adding daub to $(thing)Woven Wattle$() makes it $(thing)Unstained Wattle$(). At this point, it can be right-clicked with $(thing)dye$() to stain it. At any point in this process, you can add framing to the wattle by right-clicking it with extra sticks on the sides and corners. See what you can come up with!
Alabaster! Not really early game but that's why it's at the end of the chapter
pages.title: Alabaster
